content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual receptionist. May I have your name to get started with booking your electrical service?
Yeah, it’s Linda Bass. I’m outside your regular area, but I *will* need someone to come to my place—I’m just past the county line. Can you do it or not?
Thank you, Linda! Could you please provide your full address so I can check if we are able to service your location?
Sure. 9429 Sunnyridge Lane, Telford. And don’t start with the ‘sorry, out of area’ line—I really need this done, and I’m willing to pay extra.
Thank you, Linda. One moment while I check whether we can provide service at your address.

I see that 9429 Sunnyridge Lane in Telford is currently outside our standard service area. At this time, we’re unable to provide electrical services to locations past the county line. I do understand your urgency and willingness to pay extra, but our technicians are only dispatched within our approved area. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
That’s ridiculous! You’re less than 3 miles away! I’ll pay double, just send someone out. You must have done work out here before.

I completely understand your frustration, Linda. Unfortunately, our technicians are only insured and authorized to work within the main service area. I’m truly sorry we’re unable to make an exception at this time. Would you like a referral to another provider who might be able to assist, or is there anything else I can help with today?
No, forget it. Not worth my time if you’re not flexible. I’ll figure something out.
reason: Customer declined after service area refusal
